description: Rescue teams from Germany joined Czech crews to bring the fire under control in Vejprty.
title: Czech fire: Eight killed at disabled people's home in Vejprty
title_page: Czech fire: Eight killed at disabled people's home in Vejprty - BBC News
maintext: Ms Gavdunova said fire protections in the building were above legal standards, and that smoke detectors were installed although they are not required by law. But no detectors were present in the area where the blaze began.
